Services

Class ServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.ServiceClient

  • public class ServiceClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by George on 5/11/2017. Clasa ServiceClient este folosita ca intermediar intre aplicatia noastra si accesul la datele unui client
